Html:
Hello,

It seems like the latest updates to jquery html5 data attributes get will not work with the data-rateit-... values? We went through all of our code to update all html5 data objects, including our copy of rateit, when we updated to 1.6.1. 

Regards,
Patrick

Hi Patrick,

RateIt has been tested on 1.6 and 1.6.1, and works great. 

The changes to jQuery don't affect RateIt.

The camelcasing only affect when getting all the data on an object:

var obj = $('#rateit').data() => here we now have obj.rateitValue 

But our reading/write via $('#rateit').data('rateit-value') is still valid, and works as before.

Gidon
